title: Olympic games 1956
brief_description: A survey of Melbourne Olympic Games; opening by the Duke of Edinburgh; arrival of the Olympic torch carried by Ron Clarke; Olympic oath taken by John Landy. Highlights of events. Closing ceremony in which athletes took part for the first time as individuals.
